title: When is the new champion going to be announced?
body: Just wondering when will the new "marksman" high risk high reward champ (as riot stated) will be announced and after that how long should we expect to see him in game?

replies.body: Another adc lol. Where are the toplaners/ junglers?

announced now its all good

And pretty sure they said she in all their previous teasers towards it anyway, so no idea why you said him
There is a chance it will be announced by tomorrow bro, but if not, then wait till 2 weeks later, probs the new champ will be in the PBE in patch 8.6.
